author: wn.com
title: Azerbaijan: Rights Defenders’ Convictions Under Appeal (HRW - Human Rights Watch)
text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) ( Berlin ) – A court in Baku will hear the appeal against the convictions of the prominent rights defenders Leyla and Arif Yunus on October 12 , 2015 , Human Rights Watch said today. The flawed convictions,
